title: #1 riven oce confirmed
body:
just beat my boyfriend in a riven 1v1 and he always claims to be best riven oce. :) i smashed him

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

my fiancee always kicks my arse in games... wonder why? There's a saying men understand as we get past the teen years.... 

"A happy wife is a happy life." {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
wow you beat Dezz? i'm impressed ! grats girl :3 always have faith in you :)

The majority of your posts look like sarcasm or that you're mocking others.
